reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were very happy with this hotel. We stayed in Room 5 which was a classical room. It was a good sized room with large windows onto the garden which was beautiful. We had a warm welcome and lots of helpful advice on Nice. The hotel was clean, quiet and in an excellent location for exploring Nice. The breakfast was very yummy!
reviews.title: Great stay in Nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed two nights in Room #2. Although previous reviewers complained about the noise level in this room, we did not have this experience. Our stay at the Nice Garden Hotel was comfortable, convenient, and pleasant. Marion and her staff are most friendly and helpful. The room was very quiet at night. Of course, once breakfast service starts, one can hear some activity, but my wife and I were always up by 8AM anyway. Yes, the shower and bathroom are small, but this is a 2 star hotel. The breakfast in the garden is a most enjoyable experience. Given the price, location, friendliness and helpfulness of the staff, I think this is an outstanding value. I definitely would stay here again.
reviews.title: Excellent Experience !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lovely place, very friendly, I felt very well looked after! I would highly recommend it.
reviews.title: It was Great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Having just read the most recent comments about the Nice Garden Hotel I just had to agree about Room 2 - the noise of people walking out to the garden for breakfast woke me, and kept me awake, each morning! (Ironically I think it was Marion or her staff walking up and down providing their friendly service which was one of the main causes!). I also agree that the bathroom was very small and each night I had to move the bed away from the wall. However, on the plus side, the welcome and service was great, the location is fantastic and remembering that you're in a 2 star hotel it was good value for money. Would I stay there again? Perhaps for a city break when you're on a budget and want to be up and about early every morning. But for a relaxing, summer holiday - probably not.
reviews.title: Great service but noisy corridor

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We only stayed here for one night but had a great experience in keeping with what the previous reviews say. Great welcome and fantastic breakfast in the garden. We stayed in room 7 which was basic (and perhaps a bit dark) but clean and had a comfortable bed.
reviews.title: Great, affordable hotel in central location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Another fan of the Nice Garden Hotel. We spent seven nights there a week ago and found the stay to be exactly as others have stated before on similar reviews.
reviews.title: As the others have said...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As a seasoned "business traveler" who prefers corporate chain hotels and usually doesn't like most B&B experiences, I found this hotel to be a perfect hybrid of the concepts. The service was very personal and attentive and the property itself to be very homey and comfortable.
reviews.title: Mixed Bag

likes.disliked: — The horrible accomodation AKA - our room

reviews.text: The location is simply fantastic for anything you would want to do in Nice, and so convenient to the train station that the walk, even with rolling suitcases was very manageable. In fact the location was so suitable, we scaled back some of our daytrips just to relax... either by the sea, or in the Flower market or even just walking around the shops just a block or 2 away.
reviews.title: Home away from home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is obvious the hosts have hotel management experience as they run the place in a very orderly way... in addition, we were more often than not greeted when we got back to the hotel. You get the feeling you are guests in their home as opposed to simply occupying a room.
reviews.title: Friendly welcome in Nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Two thumbs up for this hotel, and thanks to Marion, Katerina and the entire family for making our stay a memorable one.
